title: Bistro at Cabot Shores
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The Bistro is part of the Cabot Shores Wilderness Resort. It specializes in slow cooked cuisine, vegetarian and vegan fare using fresh ingredients grown on a garden on the premises (apples from its orchard, and wild berries), foraged in the wild, or obtained from a local farm. Ocean-view dining room and deck. Offers daily breakfast and dinner; check hours for seasonal hours.
